data.title: Naomi Osaka Explains Why She’s Investing in Women’s Sports
data.meta_description: Naomi Osaka is one of the world’s most recognizable and marketable athletes. The Japanese tennis player, who’s lived most her life in the US, is a four-time Grand Slam winner.
data.text:
Japanese Grand Slam winner returns after birth of daughter

Investments in pickleball, women’s soccer among her portfolio

Naomi Osaka is one of the world’s most recognizable and marketable athletes. The Japanese tennis player, who’s lived most her life in the US, is a four-time Grand Slam winner.

She’s been open about her struggles with depression and took a break from the sport starting in 2022. Osaka returned last month in Australia after giving birth to her first child in July.
